title: How to decrypt a PIE file for a game's assets?
content:
I want to see the assets for Garbage Pail Kids: Mad Mike and the Quest for Stale Gum

I noticed the file was in PIE format. I tried opening them with every program I have, but nothing works; And add insult to injury, the file's encrypted.

What do I do?

answers_data.content:
You can use this tool to decrypt assets.pie file.

https://github.com/Masquerade64/Cowabunga
